name: PDFCrop
shortdesc: The amount of the PDF document to place.

property.name: CROP_ART
property.shortdesc: Places only the area defined by the PDF author as placeable artwork.

property.name: CROP_PDF
property.shortdesc: Places only the area displayed by Acrobat.

property.name: CROP_TRIM
property.shortdesc: Places only the area that represents the final trim size of the document.

property.name: CROP_BLEED
property.shortdesc: Places only the area that represents clipped content.

property.name: CROP_MEDIA
property.shortdesc: Places the area that represents the physical paper size of the original PDF document.

property.name: CROP_CONTENT_VISIBLE_LAYERS
property.shortdesc: Places the page's bounding box using visible layers only.

property.name: CROP_CONTENT_ALL_LAYERS
property.shortdesc: Places the page's bounding box using all layers.
